content: Hey everyone, we are looking for someone implement the Near protocol to our services on a 4-8 week contract  - on-going for maintenance and support. Experience with smart contracts and escrow agreements is ideally needed. The finer details will be discussed over a call but in the meantime, I'd love to chat with some of you! Send over your CV and experience to Chis@yanda.io. - Thank you :smile:
Also just seen that you can send messages so you are more than welcome to get me on here. - and please, if there is a better way to post a job opportunity for a dev let me know :)

There's a thread that's posted on Reddit (e.g. https://www.reddit.com/r/rust/comments/iix8vw/official_rrust_whos_hiring_thread_for_jobseekers/) periodically and a jobs section in https://this-week-in-rust.org/blog/2020/09/04/this-week-in-rust-354/. Zulip is generally geared towards compiler contributors, but other discussions are not actively discouraged, AFAICT.
Also generally we don't encourage job posts here
that's great, i'll check them out, thank you!
No problem, this place came from a recommendation of another Rust dev. As this is a Rust environment it could be good to have a section for know opportunities :)
